'<col=66CCFF>Blood Rush     | Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune'), floor(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2))) + ' | Cost: 300g  | Total: ' + (300 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune'), floor(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2))) < 1000 ? 300 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune'), floor(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2))) + 'g' : floor((300 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune'), floor(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2))) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + ' | Max hit: 15' : '<col=444444>Blood Rush     | Requires: 2 Chaos + 1 Blood'}

${(inv_qty('Death rune') >= 2 && inv_qty('Blood rune') >= 2) ? '<col=66CCFF>Blood Burst    | Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) + ' | Cost: 520g  | Total: ' + (520 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) < 1000 ? 520 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) + 'g' : floor((520 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + ' | Max hit: 21' : '<col=444444>Blood Burst    | Requires: 2 Death + 2 Blood'}

${(inv_qty('Blood rune') >= 2 && inv_qty('Death rune') >= 2) ? '<col=66CCFF>Blood Blitz    | Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) + ' | Cost: 740g  | Total: ' + (740 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) < 1000 ? 740 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) + 'g' : floor((740 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 2, inv_qty('Death rune') / 2)) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + ' | Max hit: 25' : '<col=444444>Blood Blitz    | Requires: 2 Blood + 2 Death'}

${(inv_qty('Blood rune') >= 4 && inv_qty('Death rune') >= 4) ? '<col=66CCFF>Blood Barrage  | Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 4, inv_qty('Death rune') / 4)) + ' | Cost: 960g  | Total: ' + (960 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 4, inv_qty('Death rune') / 4)) < 1000 ? 960 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 4, inv_qty('Death rune') / 4)) + 'g' : floor((960 * floor(min(inv_qty('Blood rune') / 4, inv_qty('Death rune') / 4)) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + ' | Max hit: 29' : '<col=444444>Blood Barrage  | Requires: 4 Blood + 4 Death'}
